title: You get a promotion at work
description: You question yourself and wonder when they'll realize you're an unqualified imposter, instead of trusting yourself & your abilities.

title: You find a lost puppy
description: You feel a warm, fuzzy feeling as you reunite the puppy with its owner.

title: You win a lottery
description: You're elated but cautious, knowing that sudden wealth can bring unexpected challenges.

title: You miss your bus
description: You take a deep breath, knowing that setbacks are a part of life, and figure out an alternative plan.

title: You forget your wallet at home
description: You feel frustrated but grateful for the opportunity to practice patience and problem-solving.

title: You receive unexpected good news
description: You smile from ear to ear, feeling a surge of happiness and gratitude.

title: You fail at something you've been working on
description: You acknowledge the disappointment but remind yourself that failure is a stepping stone to success.
